data.name: Fantasy Blacksmith - Escape From The Forge
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy 4 new locations, teleportation, new resources, and ores for mining.

This DLC features:

  • Added a portal to the Magic Forest. Which can be placed in the forge and used for teleportation to the outside world
  • Added 4 portal stones to the store. Which transfer the character to different locations when used on the portal
  • Added 4 new locations: Abandoned Cemetery, Magic Forest, Mithril Mines and Dragon Cliff
  • Now it is possible to search for and extract rare resources in new locations
  • Added 2 new ores that can be mined in certain locations.
  • Added a book in which all items are written that can be obtained in a non-standard way and all the ways to get them

data.supported_languages: English, French, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP \ 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video card memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
